headline: What M&A Drought? NOG ‘Assessing’ 10 Deals Valued at $8B
summary: Northern Oil and Gas, with a history of teaming up with other dealmaking E&Ps, is seeing what executives called some of the largest non-op asset packages, “maybe ever” hit the market.
